RT by @IsraelMFA: In an act of moral clarity the German @CDU party conference called today to end funding for UNRWA and seek alternative ways to provide assistance to Gaza, that have not been infiltrated by Hamas terrorists. Likewise, the CDU called to end the "pay-for-slay" payments, the financial incentives for terror against Israelis, and to put an end to the systematic incitement of hatred in Palestinian school textbooks.
